author: TacticalFox27
SpaceNavy
clothos-commander-bsg-legends.name: Clothos
clothos-commander-bsg-legends.ability:
When a friendly ship is defending, you may remove 1 raid token from the attacking ship to ready 1 defense token.
When a friendly ship activates, you may spend raid tokens on enemy ships within distance 1-5 to resolve a matching command token. If you do so, remove that raid token from the enemy ship.

author: TacticalFox27
SpaceNavy
william-adama-commander-bsg-legends.name: William Adama
william-adama-commander-bsg-legends.ability: When a friendly ship reveals a command, you may reveal and discard 1 dial from this card. That ship gains a matching dial to that discarded dial.

author: SpaceNavy
Link
Skyhammer
captain-keyes-commander-halo-legends.name: Captain Keyes
captain-keyes-commander-halo-legends.ability: Before a friendly ship resolves a :nav: command dial, it may discard that dial. If it does, after it performs its maneuver, it may perform a 0-speed maneuver with a yaw value of "I".

author: SpaceNavy
Link
Skyhammer
thel-vadamee-commander-halo-legends.name: Thel Vadamee
thel-vadamee-commander-halo-legends.ability:
Ships in your fleet gain Elite.
After both players have finished deploying fleets, you may redeploy up to 2 small ships or 1 medium-large ship. You may also redeploy up to 2 squadrons.

admiral-ackbar-commander-new-republic-le.author: Armada Legends
admiral-ackbar-commander-new-republic-le.name: Admiral Ackbar {NR}
admiral-ackbar-commander-new-republic-le.ability: Before a friendly ship's Attack step, it may choose to attack only once this activation. If it does, it may add 2 red dice to its attack pool while attacking a ship.

etahn-abaht-commander-new-republic-legen.author: Armada Legends
etahn-abaht-commander-new-republic-legen.name: Etahn A'baht {NR}
etahn-abaht-commander-new-republic-legen.ability: While a friendly ship or squadron resolves the :brace: defense effect, if it is at distance 1-3 of another friendly ship, it reduces the total damage to half rounded down, to a minimum of 1.

garm-bel-iblis-commander-new-republic-le.author: Armada Legends
garm-bel-iblis-commander-new-republic-le.name: Garm Bel Iblis {NR}
garm-bel-iblis-commander-new-republic-le.ability: After deploying fleets, place 2 non-consecutive round tokens on this card. During each round matching 1 of those tokens, when a friendly ship activates, it may gain 1 additional command dial of your choice.

wedge-antilles-commander-new-republic-le.author: Armada Legends
wedge-antilles-commander-new-republic-le.name: Wedge Antilles {NR}
wedge-antilles-commander-new-republic-le.ability:
While a friendly ship resolves a :squadron: command, if it spent a :squadron: token, each squadron it activates may increase its speed by 1 to a maximum of 5 until the end of its activation.
Friendly squadrons without ESCORT gain GRIT while at distance 1 of friendly squadrons with ESCORT.

areta-bell-officer-new-republic-legends.author: Armada Legends
areta-bell-officer-new-republic-legends.name: Areta Bell {NR}
areta-bell-officer-new-republic-legends.ability: :squadron:: The battery armament of each squadron with SNIPE that you activate is increased by 1 red die until the end of its activation.

cilghal-officer-new-republic-legends.author: Armada Legends
cilghal-officer-new-republic-legends.name: Cilghal {NR}
cilghal-officer-new-republic-legends.ability: At the beginning of the Ship Phase, you may spend 1 :redirect: token to move up to 2 shields from 1 of your hull zones to another hull zones. If you do, the number of shields in that hull zone cannot exceed '6.' You cannot recover shields while any hull zone is greater than its maximum shield value.

commodore-turk-brand-officer-new-republi.author: Armada Legends
commodore-turk-brand-officer-new-republi.name: Commodore Turk Brand {NR}
commodore-turk-brand-officer-new-republi.ability: While attacking, you may discard 1 command token from this card to reroll 1 die at long range, 2 dice at medium range, or 3 dice at close range.

talon-karrde-officer-new-republic-legend.author: Armada Legends
talon-karrde-officer-new-republic-legend.name: Talon Karrde {NR}
talon-karrde-officer-new-republic-legend.ability: When you reveal a command, you may discard one command token from this card to discard a matching command token from an enemy ship at distance 1-3.

boldheart-title-new-republic-legends.author: Armada Legends
boldheart-title-new-republic-legends.name: Boldheart {NR}
boldheart-title-new-republic-legends.ability: When a friendly ship at distance 1-2 is defending, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, you may suffer 1 damage to force the attacker to reroll 1 die of your choice.

endurance-title-new-republic-legends.author: Armada Legends
endurance-title-new-republic-legends.name: Endurance {NR}
endurance-title-new-republic-legends.ability: :squadron:: When you activate a set aside squadron with SNIPE, you may place it at distance 1-4 instead of distance 1. Squadrons activated this way treat all enemy squadrons as if they are HEAVY until the end of the round.

intrepid-title-new-republic-legends.author: Armada Legends
intrepid-title-new-republic-legends.name: Intrepid {NR}
intrepid-title-new-republic-legends.ability: When attacking a squadron, each of your unspent :accuracy: icons add 1 damage to the damage total.

galactic-voyager-title-new-republic-lege.author: Armada Legends
galactic-voyager-title-new-republic-lege.name: Galactic Voyager {NR}
galactic-voyager-title-new-republic-lege.ability: After the Reveal Command Dial step, you may choose up to 2 friendly ships at distance 1-5. Each chosen ship discards 1 command token. For each token discarded this way, that ship may gain 1 command token of your choice.

brilliant-title-new-republic-legends.author: Armada Legends
brilliant-title-new-republic-legends.name: Brilliant {NR}
brilliant-title-new-republic-legends.ability: While defending, you may exhaust a readied defense token to resolve the :evade: defense effect instead of that token's effect.

resolve-title-new-republic-legends.author: Armada Legends
resolve-title-new-republic-legends.name: Resolve {NR}
resolve-title-new-republic-legends.ability: When attacking a squadron, each of your unspent :accuracy: icons add 1 damage to the damage total.

new-republic-infiltrators-new-republic-l.author: Armada Legends
new-republic-infiltrators-new-republic-l.name: New Republic Infiltrators {NR}
new-republic-infiltrators-new-republic-l.ability:
*New Republic only.*
When you reveal a command, you may discard a :squadron: dial or token and this card to choose 1 enemy ship at close range. That ship must discard its command dial without resolving a command during its next activation.

general-romodi-officer-legends.author: Armada Legends
general-romodi-officer-legends.name: General Romodi
general-romodi-officer-legends.ability:
Non-huge ship only.
When attacking a squadron, your attacks cannot be obstructed.

darth-maul-commander-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
darth-maul-commander-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
darth-maul-commander-scum-legends.name: Darth Maul {Scum}
darth-maul-commander-scum-legends.ability: While a friendly ship is attacking, it may spend 1 of its defense tokens. If it does, it may spend a matching defense token on the defender.

hondo-ohnaka-commander-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
hondo-ohnaka-commander-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
hondo-ohnaka-commander-scum-legends.name: Hondo Ohnaka {Scum}
hondo-ohnaka-commander-scum-legends.ability:
Before an enemy ship at distance 1-5 of a friendly ship would gain a command token, you may exhaust this card to assign it to that friendly ship instead.
At the start of the Ship Phase, you may exhaust this card to discard any number of command tokens from friendly ships and assign that number of matching raid tokens to enemy ship at distance 1-5.

prince-xizor-commander-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
prince-xizor-commander-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
prince-xizor-commander-scum-legends.name: Prince Xizor {Scum}
prince-xizor-commander-scum-legends.ability: Before a friendly ship would be dealt 1 or more damage cards, you may deal 1 of those damage cards to another friendly ship at distance 1-4 of the defender.

smugglers-cache-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
smugglers-cache-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
smugglers-cache-scum-legends.name: Smugglers Cache {Scum}
smugglers-cache-scum-legends.ability: You may spend or discard command dials from this card as if they were matching command tokens assigned to your ship.

boarding-grapples-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
boarding-grapples-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
boarding-grapples-scum-legends.name: Boarding Grapples {Scum}
boarding-grapples-scum-legends.ability:
*Pirate only.*
Any :weapons-team-offensive-retro: upgrade you equip may be used at close-medium range.
Gain 1 :offensive-retro: icon in your upgrade bar.

jiro-officer-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
jiro-officer-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
jiro-officer-scum-legends.name: Jiro {Scum}
jiro-officer-scum-legends.ability:
*Pirate only.*
When you activate, a friendly ship at distance 1-5 may discard 1 of its :commander: or :officer: cards (other than Jiro) to recover 1 of your discarded defense tokens.

savage-oppress-officer-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
savage-oppress-officer-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
savage-oppress-officer-scum-legends.name: Savage Oppress {Scum}
savage-oppress-officer-scum-legends.ability: While attacking, if at least 1 of your defense tokens is exhausted or discarded, you may add 1 die of any color to the attack.

ziton-moj-officer-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
ziton-moj-officer-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
ziton-moj-officer-scum-legends.name: Ziton Moj {Scum}
ziton-moj-officer-scum-legends.ability: When you would be dealt a facedown damage card, you may choose for it to be faceup. If you do, flip 1 damage card facedown on another friendly ship at distance 1-4. If it is their only damage card, discard it.

pirate-crew-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
pirate-crew-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
pirate-crew-scum-legends.name: Pirate Crew {Scum}
pirate-crew-scum-legends.ability:
*Pirate only.*
 When a friendly ship at distance 1-5 gains a command token, you may exhaust this card to gain 1 command token matching the one on this card.

vanity-price-title-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
vanity-price-title-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
vanity-price-title-scum-legends.name: Vanity Price {Scum}
vanity-price-title-scum-legends.ability:
Your printed anti-squadron armament is increased by 1 black die.
While attacking a squadron, you may spend 1 die with a :crit: icon to toggle it's activation slider to the activated side.

wild-karrde-title-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
wild-karrde-title-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
wild-karrde-title-scum-legends.name: Wild Karrde {Scum}
wild-karrde-title-scum-legends.ability: Your printed battery armament for your front hull zone is increased by 1 blue die.

flatline-title-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
flatline-title-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
flatline-title-scum-legends.name: Flatline {Scum}
flatline-title-scum-legends.ability:
Treat your printed battery armament in your rear hull zone as 1 blue and 1 black die.
After you deploy, gain 1 :salvo: defense token.

poison-moon-title-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
poison-moon-title-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
poison-moon-title-scum-legends.name: Poison Moon {Scum}
poison-moon-title-scum-legends.ability: When you reveal a command dial, you may discard this card. If you do, until the end of the round, black dice in your battery armament may be used at medium range and blue dice in your battery armament may be used at long range.

charybdis-title-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
charybdis-title-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
charybdis-title-scum-legends.name: Charybdis {Scum}
charybdis-title-scum-legends.ability: The printed shield values of your front, left, and right hull zones are increased by 1.

savrip-title-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
savrip-title-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
savrip-title-scum-legends.name: Savrip {Scum}
savrip-title-scum-legends.ability:
While attacking, if your speed is 0 or 1 and this is your first attack during your activation, you may add 2 dice of any color to your attack pool.
If you do, you cannot attack again during this activation.

redhawk-title-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
redhawk-title-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
redhawk-title-scum-legends.name: Redhawk {Scum}
redhawk-title-scum-legends.ability:
You gain 1 :turbolaser: icon in your upgrade bar.
You lose 1 :defensive-retro: icon in your upgrade bar.

omzes-incredible-traveling-starport-titl.author: Armada Legends
omzes-incredible-traveling-starport-titl.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
omzes-incredible-traveling-starport-titl.name: Omze's Incredible Traveling Starport {Scum}
omzes-incredible-traveling-starport-titl.ability:
You can be assigned any number of command tokens of any types.
When a friendly ship at distance 1-5 reveals a command dial, it may discard 1 command token assigned to you to gain a matching command token.

tibanna-disruptors-scum-legends.author: Armada Legends
tibanna-disruptors-scum-legends.release: Armada Legends Scum and Villainy Wave 1
tibanna-disruptors-scum-legends.name: Tibanna Disruptors
tibanna-disruptors-scum-legends.ability: **RED :crit:**: Look at the top 2 damage cards of the defender's damage deck. Deal 1 of them faceup to the defender and discard the other. Then suffer 2 damage.

author: Armada Legends
ion-pulse-emitter-legends.name: Ion Pulse Emitter
ion-pulse-emitter-legends.ability:
Modification.
Ignition [Long]
When you perform an ignition attack, you may exhaust this card and spend a defense token. If you do, after the modify dice step, discard all attack dice. For each matching die face, resolve the following effects:
:hit:: The defending hull zone loses 1 shield.
:crit:: Each hull zone adjacent to the defending hull zone loses 1 shield.

author: Armada Legends
ionic-plasma-rotors-legends.name: Ionic Plasma Rotors
ionic-plasma-rotors-legends.ability:
Modification.
Ignition [Long]
Ignition,:crit:: Toggle the activation slider for each squadron within distance 1-2 of the defender to the activated side.

author: Armada Legends
kyber-beam-cannon-legends.name: Kyber Beam Cannon
kyber-beam-cannon-legends.ability:
Modification. "Beam" only.
Ignition [Long]
Treat your special battery dice pool as 9 black dice. You cannot add a non-black die to this attack.
While performing an ignition attack, all damage cards are dealt faceup. After you perform an ignition attack, discard this card.

author: Armada Legends
blue-hawk-title-legends.name: Blue Hawk
blue-hawk-title-legends.ability:
Treat your rear hull zone's printed battery armament as 2 blue dice.
You gain 1 :weapons-team: icon in your upgrade bar.

author: Armada Legends
furious-title-legends.name: Furious
furious-title-legends.ability: While attacking a squadron, each of your unspent :accuracy: icons add 1 damage to the damage total.

author: Armada Legends
condor-title-legends.name: Condor
condor-title-legends.ability: :squadron:: Squadrons you activate that have only 1 die in their battery armament may add 1 red die to their attack pool when attacking a ship.

author: Skyhammer
shadow-title-legends.name: Shadow
shadow-title-legends.ability: While a friendly ship is defending from a ship, if the attack line of sight is traced through you, the attacker must remove 1 additional die from their attack pool.

author: Armada Legends
devastation-title-legends.name: Devastation
devastation-title-legends.ability:
Beam only.
When you would discard a :super-weapon: card on the equipped ship, you may discard this card instead.

author: Armada Legends
subjugator-title-legends.name: Subjugator
subjugator-title-legends.ability: At the start of the first round, you may replace 1 of your defense tokens with a :redirect: defense token.

author: Armada Legends
malevolence-title-legends.name: Malevolence
malevolence-title-legends.ability:
Ion only.
Ignition,:crit:: Cancel all attack dice and reduce the defender's speed to 0, then discard this card.

precision-turbolaser-turrets-legends.author: Armada Legends
precision-turbolaser-turrets-legends.name: Precision Turbolaser Turrets
precision-turbolaser-turrets-legends.ability: While performing a non-IGNITION attack against a ship, during the Spend Defense Tokens step, if a die would be removed from the attack pool, the defender must choose to keep or reroll that die instead.
